org.jdrupes.httpcodec

Class DecoderResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdrupes.httpcodec.DecoderResult

  • public class DecoderResult
extends java.lang.Object
    The result of invoking the request decoder. Used to inform the invoker about what to do next.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      boolean getCloseConnection()
      Returns true if the connection should be closed.

      Returns true if the result includes a request.

      • hasResponse

        public boolean hasResponse()
        Returns true if the result includes a response. A response in the decoder result indicates that some problem occurred that must be signaled back to the client.
        Returns:
        the result

      • getResponse

        public HttpResponse getResponse()
        Returns:
        the response

      • getCloseConnection

        public boolean getCloseConnection()
        Returns true if the connection should be closed. If the result has a response, that response must be sent before closing the connection.
        Returns:
        the result
